root: ^Unlike most of the buildings here this one has a large point at the top. The building seems to be of such a large scale but for what purpose?

^Humans can’t climb walls of this length, and walls with this texture are difficult to climb to begin with. When I learnt how to stick to walls, we trained with flat surfaces. Their training mirrors are so high up, they can’t reach them.
^This must be where their leader is, I should climb up later and greet them. I should get one of those spider people costumes I see in human entertainment.
